shortdesc.ph: Reasons for client role change failure.

plentry.pd: (1): The number of broadcasters in the channel exceeds the limit. This enumeration value is reported only when the 128-user feature is enabled. The maximum number of broadcasters depends on the actual number of broadcasters configured when the 128-user feature is enabled.
(2): The request was rejected by the Agora server. It is recommended to prompt the user to retry switching roles.
(3): Request timed out. It is recommended to prompt the user to check the network connection and retry switching roles.
(4): The client instance is disconnected from the Agora edge server. You can troubleshoot the failure reason via the reason in the callback.
